use.name: use
use.values: currentPage=Always on this page|onDemand=On demand|always=Always on this wiki

property.html:
Hello ${recipientName},

${xwiki.getUserName($xcontext.user)} thought you might be interested in the document $!{escapetool.xml(${doc.displayTitle})} on ${request.getServerName()}.

#if ("$!{message}" != '')

Here is their message:

$!{escapetool.xml($message)}
#end

To visit this document online, open ${doc.getExternalURL()} in your browser.

#if ($display == 'inline')

Here is the current version of the document:

${doc.displayTitle}

$doc.getRenderedContent()
#end

This message was generated by XWiki at ${request.serverName} on behalf of ${xwiki.getUserName($xcontext.user)}.

property.subject: $xwiki.getUserName($xcontext.user, false) wants to share a document with you

property.text:
Hello ${recipientName},
${xwiki.getUserName($xcontext.user, false)} thought you might be interested in the document "$!{escapetool.xml(${doc.displayTitle})}" (${doc.getExternalURL()}) on ${request.getServerName()}.
#if ("$!{message}" != '') Here is their message:
----------------------------------------------------- $!{escapetool.xml($message)} ----------------------------------------------------- #end
To visit this document online, open ${doc.getExternalURL()} in your browser.
#if ($display == 'inline')
Here is the current version of the document:
----------------------------------------------------- $doc.getRenderedContent()
#end
----------------------------------------------------- This message was generated by XWiki at ${request.serverName} on behalf of ${xwiki.getUserName($xcontext.user, false)}.

property.html:
Bonjour ${recipientName},

${xwiki.getUserName($xcontext.user)} a pensé que vous pourriez être intéressé par le document $!{escapetool.xml(${doc.displayTitle})} sur ${request.getServerName()}.

#if ("$!{message}" != '')

Voici son message :

$!{escapetool.xml($message)}
#end

Pour consulter le document, cliquez sur ce lien ${doc.getExternalURL()} (ou faites un copier / coller dans votre navigateur).

#if ($display == 'inline')

Voici le contenu du document :

${doc.displayTitle}

$doc.getRenderedContent()
#end

Ce message a été généré par XWiki depuis ${request.serverName} au nom de ${xwiki.getUserName($xcontext.user)}.

property.subject: $xwiki.getUserName($xcontext.user, false) souhaite partager un document avec vous

property.text:
Bonjour ${recipientName},
${xwiki.getUserName($xcontext.user, false)} a pensé que vous pourriez être intéressé par le document "$!{escapetool.xml(${doc.displayTitle})}" (${doc.getExternalURL()}) sur ${request.getServerName()}.
#if ("$!{message}" != '') Voici son message :
----------------------------------------------------- $!{escapetool.xml($message)} ----------------------------------------------------- #end
Pour consulter le document, cliquez sur ce lien ${doc.getExternalURL()} (ou faites un copier / coller dans votre navigateur).
#if ($display == 'inline')
Voici le contenu du document :
----------------------------------------------------- $doc.getRenderedContent()
#end
----------------------------------------------------- Ce message a été généré par XWiki depuis ${request.serverName} au nom de ${xwiki.getUserName($xcontext.user, false)}.

property.html:
Guten Tag ${recipientName},

${xwiki.getUserName($context.user)} möchte Sie auf das Dokument $!{escapetool.xml(${doc.displayTitle})} hinweisen.

#if ("$!{message}" != '')

Nachricht von $xwiki.getUserName($context.user, false):

		$!{escapetool.xml($message)}
#end

Um das Dokument online zu sehen, öffnen Sie ${doc.getExternalURL()} in Ihrem Browser.

#if ($display == 'inline')

Inhalt des Dokumentes:

${doc.displayTitle}

$doc.getRenderedContent()
#end

Dies Nachricht ist generiert worden vom Wiki ${request.serverName} im Auftrag von ${xwiki.getUserName($context.user)}.

property.subject: $xwiki.getUserName($context.user, false) hat eine Seite mit Ihnen geteilt

property.text:
Guten Tag ${recipientName},
${xwiki.getUserName($context.user, false)} möchte Sie auf das Dokument "$!{escapetool.xml(${doc.displayTitle})}" (${doc.getExternalURL()}) hinweisen.
#if ("$!{message}" != '') Nachricht von $xwiki.getUserName($context.user, false):
----------------------------------------------------- $!{escapetool.xml($message)} ----------------------------------------------------- #end
Um das Dokument online zu sehen, öffnen Sie ${doc.getExternalURL()} in Ihrem Browser.
#if ($display == 'inline')
Inhalt des Dokumentes:
----------------------------------------------------- $doc.getRenderedContent()
#end
----------------------------------------------------- Dies Nachricht ist generiert worden vom Wiki ${request.serverName} im Auftrag von ${xwiki.getUserName($context.user, false)}.

use.name: use
use.values: currentPage=Always on this page|onDemand=On demand|always=Always on this wiki
